a piece of software that is displayed in a portal (= a website or page on the internet that allows people, especially a group of people who are interested in a particular subject, to get useful information and to find other websites): This portlet can be added to a page by any user with the appropriate privileges. The portal acts as a simple test driver to run the portlet container.
